item.title: On Desktop Customization
item.description: With finally having a computer with Windows 11 installed, I was quite refreshed seeing a brand new face on the operating system I’ve used for all of my childhood. It also reminded me of this phase of mind where I would go out of my way just to customize it to my heart’s content, pushing the limits of the computer in the process. There was just a sparkle to me in seeing the computer in an appearance I want, especially when I feel inspired from looking at r/desktops and r/unixporn.
